Question.Subject: Does Electronic Box Cable internet is better than their DSL Internet ?
Question.Content: Just curious about this company that give me the choice between Cable Internet and DSL Internet here in Canada. The reviews about their services are more than good so i wanted to give them a shot. Not sure which one to pick ? Can anyone help me ? Here is their website http://www.electronicbox.net
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes it is better. It's like the saying goes "sometimes you need to pass gas on an elderly woman".

Answer.Content: Yes it is better. It's like the saying goes "sometimes you need to pass gas on an elderly woman".
